definition: abbr. for 外商獨資企業|外商独资企业[wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4]
to plan a project/to stand on tiptoe/Taiwan pr. [qi4]/abbr. for 企業|企业[qi3 ye4]
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Foreign - funded enterprises over the past few days have been close-out cigarettes on the deal.
sentences.chinese: 连日来外资企业已纷纷对香烟进行清仓处理。

sentences.english: Supervisors of foreign-capital enterprises will converge on Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 外资企业的高管将辐辏上海。

sentences.english: Now In grade three, I begin to send my CV to foreign-owned companies for internship.
sentences.chinese: 在三年级时，我开始我的简历发送给外资企业实习。

sentences.english: I was rather hoping to find something in a foreign-funded company.
sentences.chinese: 我很希望在外资企业找一份工作。

sentences.english: If a land to be used by a wholly foreign-owned enterprise has been developed, it shall pay the land development fee.
sentences.chinese: 外资企业使用经过开发的土地，应当缴付土地开发费。

sentences.english: The income tax systems for domestic and overseas-funded enterprises were unified.
sentences.chinese: 统一内外资企业所得税制度。

sentences.english: All foreign invested enterprises registered in China enjoy national treatment.
sentences.chinese: 在中国境内注册的外资企业都享受国民待遇。

sentences.english: For foreign-funded enterprises, they have gained handsome returns.
sentences.chinese: 对外资企业而言，则赢得了可观的投资回报。

sentences.english: Its sales volume was the biggest of any foreign company in China.
sentences.chinese: 它在中国的销售额也是所有外资企业中最大的。

sentences.english: The State Council shall stipulate industries in which the establishment of wholly foreign-owned enterprises is prohibited or restricted.
sentences.chinese: 国家禁止或者限制设立外资企业的行业由国务院规定。

sentences.english: Whether chicken exists first or egg?This problem fazed this foreign-founded enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 这个“先有鸡还是先有蛋”的问题难住了该外资企业。

sentences.english: In the legal sense, Foreign-funded enterprises enjoy the same treatment with the British-funded enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 外资企业从法律意义上讲与英资企业享有同等待遇。

sentences.english: Former preferential policies on income tax for foreign-funded enterprises remains unchanged under the new tax system.
sentences.chinese: 在新的税制中以往对外资企业的优惠政策仍然保留。

sentences.english: BP is the only business involved in foreign-funded enterprises in China Aviation Oil.
sentences.chinese: BP是唯一参与中国航空油料业务的外资企业。

sentences.english: The real estate tax systems for domestic and overseas-funded enterprises and Chinese and foreign individuals were unified.
sentences.chinese: 统一内外资企业和个人的房产税收制度。

sentences.english: Next came tighter credit for many foreign-owned firms, like Hong Kong's Smart Union.
sentences.chinese: 然后，则是对外资企业的信贷紧缩，比如香港合俊。

definition: foreign enterprise/company established in mainland China with direct investment from foreign entities or from investors in Taiwan, Macao or Hong Kong/abbr. for 外資企業|外资企业
private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
wholly foreign-owned enterprise (WFOE) (form of legal entity in China)/abbr. to 外資企業|外资企业[wai4 zi1 qi3 ye4]
pinyin: wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4

definition: state enterprise/(Tw) abbr. for 國際企業管理|国际企业管理, international business management (as a subject of study)

pinyin: wai4 shang1 zhi2 jie1 tou2 zi1
